title: Search Me, O God
presentation: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

v1: Search me, O God, my actions try,
As seen by Thine all-searching eye—
To mine my ways make clear.
v2: Search all my sense, and know my heart
And let the deep, the hidden part
v3: Throw light into the darkened cells,
Quicken my conscience till it feels
v4: Search all my thoughts, the secret springs,
v5: Search, till Thy fiery glance has cast
And I by grace am brought at last
v6: Thus prostrate I shall learn of Thee,
That God alone in Christ can be
